products.title: Lanura Stone  Roman Blind
products.description: More than just a plain roman blind, this one has a designer touch. Lanura stone is a remarkably modern design with a cosy edge, instantly adding warmth and style to your surroundings. The perfectly on-trend grey is a smart choice and can be paired with pops of colour to take more than just a plain roman blind, this one has a designer touch.

products.title: Choices Apollo Moonstone Roller Blind
products.description: This classic looking choices apollo moonstone roller blind brings a touch of timeless beauty to your home. Elegant texture covers a natural and neutral coloured fabric to create a chic, luxurious look. The colourway will complement so many schemes, from light to dark, creating this classic looking choices apollo moonstone roller blind brings a touch of timeless beauty to your home.

products.title: Double Roller Metro Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Grey is one of those colours that manages to have a million shades, yet no two feel quite the same. This metro grey combination is quite a moody one, with earthy undertones and sleek colouring. Plus with the addition of a cool sunscreen behind the splendid blackout roller blind, grey is one of those colours that manages to have a million shades, yet no two feel quite the same.

products.title: Cotswold, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

products.title: Eclipse Iron Grey & Slate Double Roller Blind
products.description: Add some elegant style and some effective shading to your home with this practical and sophisticated eclipse double roller blind. A moody, slate grey combination of fabrics it's ideal for a contemporary space. The practical element comes from the combination of blackout and sheer add some elegant style and some effective shading to your home with this practical and sophisticated eclipse double roller blind.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: Glistening patterning on a pale beige background takes centre stage on the splash (blackout) blind in code, whilst its adjustable louvres and wipe-clean surface add functionality and common sense, making for the perfect mixture of head and heart. For a clean and relaxing look in your home office, group with cappuccino browns and heavy creams, to provide luxury and elegance without going over the top.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: A soft dove grey forms the basis for the palermo (blackout) light grey, gently accented by the light-reflecting, gentle texturing. For a blind that will go with almost any dcor and will last year upon year, this could be the option for you. Team the light grey with bold reds or forest greens that need tempering by a more neutral shade, forming a gorgeous colour combination in a bedroom or den. Grey can still be cosy, so don't be fooled by its cool demeanour; paired with the right colours, this blind can help you to create a warm and welcoming home.

products.title: Enjoy Luxe Ironstone Roller Blind
products.description: Our enjoy roller blinds are the perfect choice for those not wanting to compromise on privacy and a view, and this luxe limestone number is a little more, well, luxe. products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Vertical
products.description: The pale, lilac mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
